remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，使用此方法來從屬性移除時鐘時，不會停止這些時鐘。Note that using this method to remove clocks from a property does not stop those clocks. ## 使用撰寫 HandoffBehaviorUsing the Compose HandoffBehavior 當您將套用， ，或屬性使用 ，任何之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統將不會自動移除這些時鐘。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system will not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量使用時鐘，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 有幾個方式可移除時鐘。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用或動畫物件的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 這將會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。This will remove all animation clocks from the property. - 若要移除特定時鐘的清單，從使用屬性擷取，然後呼叫方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 這通常是時鐘的事件處理常式。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制;子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock will return `null`. 也請注意，是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。Note also that the event will not be called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫。In that case, the user will need to determine when to call . 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷連接並記憶體回收其時鐘。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks will also be disconnected and garbage collected. 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用使用不同的動畫時鐘設定。The following example shows how to apply animation clocks using different settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果動畫的小於或等於零，動畫開始後從下一個畫面格呈現時間經過的時間量。If the animation has a that is greater than zero, the animation begins after that amount of time has elapsed from the time the next frame is rendered. ## 使用撰寫 HandoffBehaviorUsing the Compose HandoffBehavior 當您將套用， ，或屬性使用 ，任何之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統將不會自動移除這些時鐘。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system will not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量使用時鐘，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 有幾個方式可移除時鐘。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用或動畫物件的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 這將會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。This will remove all animation clocks from the property. - 若要移除特定時鐘的清單，從使用屬性擷取，然後呼叫方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 這通常是時鐘的事件處理常式。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制;子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock will return `null`. 也請注意，是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。Note also that the event will not be called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫。In that case, the user will need to determine when to call . 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷連接並記憶體回收其時鐘。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks will also be disconnected and garbage collected. 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將使用不同的動畫套用設定。The following example shows how to apply animations using different settings. summary.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

span.span: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: A modifiable clone of this instance.

span.span: A modifiable clone of this instance.

returns.span: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.

span.span: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.
The clone's property is **false**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件。The method can be used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects. 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽繼承方法以提供強類型的實作。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited method to provide a strongly typed implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回**false**時是**true**。This method will return **false** when is **true**. 請勿呼叫這個方法，直接 （只是呼叫基底實作中）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 這個方法在內部呼叫(與`isChecking`等於`true`) 和(與`isChecking`等於`false`)。This method is called internally by (with `isChecking` equal to `true`) and (with `isChecking` equal to `false`).

span.para: 類別衍生自類別包含不會儲存使用相依性屬性的資料時，必須覆寫這個方法。一般的實作會呼叫基底實作，然後可以呼叫靜態上所有的方法型別的屬性，其中包含類別，傳回才凍結所有屬性 (或可能已都凍結，請在案例通過值)。

Classes that derive from must override this method when the class contains data that is not stored using dependency properties. A typical implementation would call the base implementation, then call the static method on all typed properties that the class contains, returning only if all properties were frozen (or could have been frozen, in the case of passing through a value for ).
